column1: NGR is quarter mile NW of Winchmore Hill, have used church for reference purpose but it is not specitfied on the record sheet. Altitude fron OS map. Could be +/- 200m, or more.

1881 does not have a totla in the original record possibly because there is a note saying the gauge changed in June, not sure if this means a new gauge or a change in location. Calculated total added to this record
